title: Steel concrete reinforcing bars - production in the U.S. 2000 to 2017
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Production in million metric tons. In total the number of data points it has is 18.
In general Production in million metric tons has stayed the same over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Production in million metric tons, of value 7.38 was reached at Year 2003
The lowest Production in million metric tons, of value 4.62 was reported at Year 2009
